column4: I'm not gonna move around or resize some stuffs simply because some African distro want me too
and I do NOT need too
this stupid installer keeps on saying "No root file system"
what the heck is that!?
I have the partition already
this is really so dumb
is it because my name is African???
<mneptok> ubuntu: stop that --> is Ubuntu not African?
and doesnt Ubuntu have the worst installer?
thanks bimberi .... let me try that penicilin
it's because you didn't pay attention to the minimal instructions during install. try installing again and actually read them.  it's only 6 pages.
I'm trying ubiquity as root now
how's the weather in San Jose, California?
not bad ... I'm in San Francisco anyway
your whois is not always right
even with ubiquity as root ... still the same damned sh!t

why dont just "vi /usr/lib/ubiquity/ubiquity/validation.py"
phew!
[Tuxedo] , usually boards with onboard graphic adapters have an option in the bios to disable them. I'd check there
